This describes the resources for all of the Libraries, Repos, Plugins, and Sample Apps. If you have any problems or requests contact support@bluecats.com.

Jump to your favourite language:

WHERE?¶

  • OpenWRT Image Builder Chaos Calmer - Program that creates the OpenWrt firmware image file (binaries? C? Lua?)

WHAT?¶

  • BlueCats Kitty Android Demo - Demo BCKitty app
  • BlueCats Now Angular - BlueCats UI platform (Angular, HTML)
  • Renesas Firmware - Renesase Firmware for the Edge (C)
  • BlueCats Loop Position Solvers - Plus Location Engine that is an integral scalar field solver (C#)
  • BlueCats Distributor Plugin - (C#)
  • BlueCats Wallet Android - Demo app (Java)
  • BlueCats Check Scanner Swift - BlueCats Check Scanner Demo (Swift)
  • BlueCats Loop X - (Python)
  • BlueCats Tracker Sample - (objective-c)
  • BlueCats Docs Firmware - (Documentation)
  • BlueCats Loop Local - (C#)

Angular¶

  • BlueCats Loop UI - BlueCats Loop UI deployment

C¶

  • React Compiler - A compiler for ChainReaction reaction lists
  • Bluecats OpenWrt LuCI - BlueCats fork of OpenWrt LuCI. Includes BlueCats specific packages.

C#¶

  • BlueCats Automations - A BlueCats management platform UI program for birthing and assembling beacons
  • BlueCats C# Serial Library BC202 USB Beacons - A Class Library for C# which enables communication over serial to BlueCats Serial beacons for our BC202-A
  • BlueCats BLE Serial Library - .NET Standard 2.0 class library for communication with BC0xx serial enabled beacons
  • BlueCats Engine Control - Location Engine management for Now platform
  • BlueCats C# BLE Parsers - A BLE Parser written in C#
  • BlueCats C# Loop API Client - The official BlueCats Loop web API client for .NET Core 2.0
  • BlueCats C# Loop Plus Location Engine - Lightweight Location Engine that can be run on any platform
  • BlueCats Samples - A commandline BLE scanner sample that prints out scanned Bluetooth Low Energy Advertisment packets
  • BlueCats Wallet C# - A CLI built with the BlueCats.Serial C# libarary for interacting with BlueCats Wallet for iOS.

Documentation¶

  • BlueCats Documentation Temporary - This a place where temporary BlueCats documents are being worked on or can be stored
  • BlueCats Documentation - Location of public BlueCats documentation using the Jekyll Framework
  • BlueCats Old Documentation - Contains Accessed old controlled documentation. Still contains iOS and Android SDK Documentation
  • Holder Documentation - Location of private Holder Documentation. Will evantually be hosted on Loop.
  • Depracated Edge Documentation - Our most current Edge documentation is found here
  • Depracated Loop Documentation - Our most current Loop Documentation is found here

HTML / CSS / JavaScript¶

  • BlueCats Documentation - Location of public BlueCats documentation using the Jekyll Framework
  • BlueCats Old Documentation - Contains Accessed old controlled documentation. Still contains iOS and Android SDK Documentation
  • BlueCats Loop UI - BlueCats Loop UI deployment

Java¶

  • Bluecats Android Mirabotic - Documentation for the Mirabotic/BlueCats app for the Verizon project
  • BlueCats Beacons Updater App - GUI Interface for DMAN built in Processing
  • BlueCats SDK for Android - The BlueCats platform can add spatial intelligence to your application and manage beacons using the Android SDK
  • BlueCats Kitty Android Demo - Point of Sales Demo Application Android Application for Atmo

Lua¶

  • Bluecats OpenWrt LuCI - BlueCats fork of OpenWrt LuCI. Includes BlueCats specific packages.

NSIS¶

  • BlueCats Mosquitto Installer - Uses NSIS to create a mosquitto installer with web sockets enabled

Objective-C¶

  • BlueCats iOS SDK - The BlueCats platform can add spatial intelligence to your application and manage beacons using the iOS SDK
  • BlueCats Kitty iOS - Point of Sales Demo Application iOS Application for Atmo

PowerShell¶

-BlueCats Automations - A BlueCats management platform UI program for birthing and assembling beacons

Python¶

  • BlueCats Edge Config Tool - Internal Edge Configuration Tool
  • BlueCats Loop Cloud - Tools for maintaining BlueCats Loop cloud solutions
  • BlueCats Python DMAN API Client - The bcdmanpiclient module allows you to interact with the BlueCats API using Python
  • BlueCats Python DMAN CLI
  • A BlueCats device management platform command line program that utilizes DMAN API Client in Python
  • BlueCats Python OMAN CLI - A BlueCats object management platform command line program for Loop in Python

Swift¶

  • BlueCats iOS SDK - The BlueCats platform can add spatial intelligence to your application and manage beacons using the iOS SDK
  • BlueCats Kitty iOS - Point of Sales Demo Application iOS Application for Atmo
